mapper.select: SELECT vt.* FROM( SELECT r1.*,IFNULL(r2.cnt,0) rcpCount,IFNULL(r3.cnt,0) scnt, SUM((IFNULL(r2.cnt,0)*10)+(IFNULL(r3.cnt,0)*5)) total, (CASE WHEN SUM((IFNULL(r2.cnt,0)*10)+(IFNULL(r3.cnt,0)*5)) >= 50 THEN '1. Head Chef' WHEN SUM((IFNULL(r2.cnt,0)*10)+(IFNULL(r3.cnt,0)*5)) >= 40 THEN '2. Sous Chef' WHEN SUM((IFNULL(r2.cnt,0)*10)+(IFNULL(r3.cnt,0)*5)) >= 30 THEN '3. Chef of Partie' WHEN SUM((IFNULL(r2.cnt,0)*10)+(IFNULL(r3.cnt,0)*5)) >= 20 THEN '4. Demi Chef' WHEN SUM((IFNULL(r2.cnt,0)*10)+(IFNULL(r3.cnt,0)*5)) >= 10 THEN '5. Commis Chef' ELSE '6. kitchen Hand' END) as grade FROM USERS r1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT uno,COUNT(rcpno) cnt FROM RCPS GROUP BY uno) r2 ON r1.uno=r2.uno LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT uno,COUNT(uno2) cnt FROM SCS GROUP BY uno) r3 ON r2.uno=r3.uno WHERE r1.email=#{value} GROUP BY r1.uno) vt ORDER BY vt.total DESC

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,vt.* FROM( select * from (SELECT u.uno, u.name, u.email, u.pwd, u.img, u.intro, u.role, u.join_dt, u.rcp_url, rcpCount FROM users u , (SELECT lk.uno,COUNT(lk.rcpno) rcpCount from rcps lk group by lk.uno) c where u.uno = c.uno) a INNER JOIN(select @rownum:=0) t ORDER BY rcpCount desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{len}) vt
